en.quote: Those people who develop the ability to continuously acquire new and better forms of knowledge that they can apply to their work and to their lives will be the movers and shakers in our society for the indefinite future

uz.quote: Doimiy ravishda yangi va yaxshiroq bilim shakllarini egallash qobiliyatini rivojlantiradigan odamlar, ularni ishlarida va hayotlarida qo‘llay oladiganlar, kelajakda jamiyatimizda harakatlantiruvchi va o‘zgaruvchilar bo‘lishadi
